name: Laser Ball (itch) (Toy Room Software)
description:
2-player online game, based on the classic Pong! New ball every second and you can catch and fire back at your opponent!

Laser Ball is a 2-player online game, based on the classic PONG, but with two hidden surprises:

1. A new ball appears every second of gameplay! So you can end with up to 60 balls bouncing all over!

2. You can catch balls and fire them back at your opponent at any time!

But be cautious! The more balls you catch the slower you move!

Please enjoy the game and feel free to leave any feedback you consider. We are still adding content to the game!

*****

The game concept of this game was born on the II Island Jam, that took place Dec 3rd-5th in the sunny Las Palmas of Gran Canaria, organized by ACADEVI.

Thanks to all the other team members:

  • Eduardo Luis Salinas Rivas
  • Daniel González Rosselló
  • Tegaray Galiano González
  • Antonio Jesús Medina Díaz

*****

ENJOY! 

Tomás L. López-Fragoso Rumeu
